settings.name: insuranceList
settings.select: a.BillState, dbo.f_Getcodename('审核状态',a.BillState) BillStateName, a.InsSaleCode, a.InsOrderCode, a.SignCode, b.CustomerName AS CustomerName, a.TranMan, a.TranDate, a.InputName, a.InputTime, a.AuditName,a.AuditTime,a.InsSaleID
settings.from: A_InsSale as a left join B_Customer as b on a.CustomerID=b.CustomerID
